name: WP Advanced Posts Widget
author: Lazar Momcilovic

sections.description: WP Advanced Posts Widget is a no fuss WordPress widget to showcase your latest, trending and popular posts. It’s lightweight, simple to use and powerful in features.
sections.installation:
To install this plugin:

  • Upload the wp-advanced-posts-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  • That’s it!

Alternatively you can search for the plugin from your WordPress dashboard and install from there.

Visit WordPress.org for a comprehensive guide on in how to install WordPress plugins.
sections.faq:
How can I send feedback or get help with a bug?

I’d love to hear your bug reports, feature suggestions and any other feedback! Please head over to the GitHub issues page to search for existing issues or open a new one. While I’ll try to triage issues reported here on the plugin forum, you’ll get a faster response (and reduce duplication of effort) by keeping everything centralized in the GitHub repository.

Want to contribute?

You can find the plugin on GitHub, and I’d love your help building it. You’re also welcome to give any feedback.
